derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Latin elisio(n-), from Latin elidere 'crush out' (see elide)

means.word_mean: 1. omission of a sound between two words (usually a vowel and the end of one word or the beginning of the next)

sentences.sentence: "with the exception of the children, everyone was told the news"
